allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Resolve white screen issue on Vercel deployment

- Add missing script entry point in index.html
- Remove conflicting esm.sh import map
- Replace CDN Tailwind with proper Tailwind v4 setup
- Add PostCSS configuration for Tailwind
- Add vercel.json for deployment settings

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add appointment booking system with admin dashboard

- Add contact form with email, phone, date, time, and service fields
- Store appointments in localStorage for data persistence
- Create dedicated /admin page with login protection
- Admin dashboard with stats, search, filter, and CSV export
- Add React Router for page navigation
- Update Vercel config for client-side routing

Password: klinikfamili2024

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
